SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( select u.emp_no, d.dept_name, ui.name, c.car_no, u.phone, c.car_date from users u, departments d, user_info ui, car c where d.dept_no = ui.dept_no and ui.emp_no = u.emp_no and u.id = c.id
and ui.name LIKE '%${name}%'
and c.car_no LIKE '%${carNo}%'
and d.dept_name LIKE '%'||upper('${deptName}')||'%'
order by u.emp_no ) t )
WHERE rn >= (#{cri.page}-1) * #{cri.perPageNum} +1 rn <= #{cri.page} * #{cri.perPageNum}

select u.emp_no, d.dept_name, ui.name, c.car_no, c.car_type, u.phone, c.car_date, ui.rank, u.emp_grade, u.id from users u, departments d, user_info ui, car c where d.dept_no = ui.dept_no and ui.emp_no = u.emp_no and u.id = c.id and u.id = #{id}
select u.emp_no, d.dept_name, ui.name, u.phone, ui.rank, u.emp_grade, u.id from users u, departments d, user_info ui where d.dept_no = ui.dept_no and ui.emp_no = u.emp_no and u.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into car ( car_no, car_type, id) values ( #{carNo}, #{carType}, #{id})
mapper.update: update car set car_type = #{carType} where car_no = #{carNo}
